DOC.brief_summary: The aim prospective randomize double-blind study compare efficacy safety cryoballoon ablation RF approach treatment paroxysmal AF fail first radiofrequency ablation .
DOC.brief_title: Cryoballoon Ablation Pulmonary Veins After Failed RF Ablation Patients With Paroxysmal AF
DOC.criteria: Previous fail first radiofrequency ablation procedure ( circumferential PV isolation without linear lesion ) patient refer second catheter ablation AF > 3 month first PVI Congestive heart failure Ejection fraction < 35 % Left atrial diameter > 60 mm
